conversation.are you a human: I am a robot, but I’m a good one. Let me prove it. How can I help you?
conversation.are you a robot: Yes I am a robot, but I’m a good one. Let me prove it. How can I help you?
conversation.else: this is me telling you i didn't understand what you just said. I am learning, you see. could you try again?
